insert into report_collection_case_web (id, report_collection_case_id, case_web_index, operation_id, operation_name, operation_element, description, exec_log, screen_shot, status) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.reportCollectionCaseId}, #{item.caseWebIndex}, #{item.operationId}, #{item.operationName}, #{item.operationElement}, #{item.description}, #{item.execLog}, #{item.screenshot}, #{item.status})
mapper.select: select status, operation_id as transId, operation_name as transName, operation_element as content, description, exec_log, screen_shot as screenshotList from report_collection_case_web where report_collection_case_id = #{reportCaseId} order by case_web_index
mapper.delete: delete from report_collection_case_web rccw left join report_collection_case rcc on rcc.id = rccw.report_collection_case_id left join report_collection rc on rc.id = rcc.report_collection_id where rc.report_id = #{reportId}
